name: wehavemagnums
text: Lie Bot's prediction proving correct!

name: mandatorylovr
text: A comment left by mandatorylovr was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by MrMojoRisin, reverendsam, rowboat)

name: mortshire
text: OH MY GOD.

name: mcwee
text: I could not agree more.  JESUS!  Onstad is the mad-crazy-nuts-OCD!  HUGS!

name: em2
text: Continuity of the Gods.

name: charhe
text: Like fine wines, this strip has only gotten better with the passing of April, 2005. And Teodor.

name: shoinan
text: Onstad for President.

name: tragicone
text: Onstad for God!

name: relaxing
text: http://achewood.com/?date=04282005

name: catachresis
text: Oh just wow . I so did not realise that. This new-fangled "Ache World" thing is quite revelatory.

name: ambala
text: Lie Bot lies about being Lie Bot sometimes.

name: fuckyoufriday
text: I guess Onstad put that in his Outlook calendar, or something. "Note to self: Teodor has near death experience on 4/28/05".

name: cicadalek
text: Well, he did say he had a post-it saying 'NOTE TO SELF: DRAW RAY'S NIPPLES' on his monitor at one stage.

name: never_die
text:
how WOULD teodor know?
has anyone really determined if lie bot is who he says he is?
someone probably already has.

name: spectre
text: Well, we know Lie Bot isn't Uncle Culpepper.

name: idsyen
text: I think Lie Bot is the Devil, because he mixes his lies with the truth.

name: evolume
text: So Lie Bot's Flux Capacitor was real???

name: dorothypoopbot
text: What else would it be, not the Flux Capacitor?

name: crinklebat
text: That was totally my 20th birthday.

name: deusoma
text: What better way to celebrate your birthday than by watching a beloved cartoon character (almost) die?

name: rowboat
text: Téodor's usually so with-it.  It really speaks to Lie Bot's power that he basically gets him every time.  When he starts to lose it, he just rebounds and nails him again.

name: luckypyjamas
text: lie bot sort of looks like he's exposing himself

name: epicurus
text: There's no "sort of" or "looks like" about it, my friend.

name: redheron
text:
only instead of himself, it's Teodor's mom.

Man, that is such a weird mental image. How is a stuffed animal born, anyway?

name: luckypyjamas
text: when a mommy stuffed animal and a daddy stuffed animal love each other... do you need it spelled out?

name: snowman
text: Lie Bot even has elaborate videos of his lies.  That's awesome.

name: daidai
text:
No, Lie Bot has videos.

He then lies about the videos.

name: dovey
text: man I don't wanna know why Lie Bot has videos of ladies giving birth to babies with armpit hair

name: hamscout
text:
Lie Bot has remote access to internet video, big whoop...
I challenge a reader to find a similar video and post it here...
*cringes to self at thought of seeing such filth*
...on second thought...

name: benkastin
text: the one i boned?

name: reburn
text: This was the first strip in which I noticed Lie Bot's shoes. Excellent.

name: pie4me6
text: He got them from Michael J. Fox.

name: greenkoolayd
text: was teodor born at build-a-bear workshop?

name: link
text: April 28th, whoa. That's my birthday.

name: atticusonline
text: So...what WAS he watching?
